title: New: Pandr Eyez – Physical Education
content:
Pandr Eyez have been friends of the site for a little while now, even headlining Brainchild Festival this summer, (they fucking killed it). The thing is, Pandr Eyez are doing what so many kids are doing at the moment; taking the age old Rn’B formula, grabbing a new-wave producer and hoping something sticks. Pandr Eyez are no different, at least on paper, but they do it with such class and vigour it’s near impossible not to be won over. Check their new single below.

Physical Education is due out on out on Double Denim on November 26.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
